item.description:
Our October meeting will be hosted by Third Sector New England.

Third Sector New England provides information and services to build the knowledge, power and effectiveness of nonprofit organizations that engage people in community and public life. We act also to promote wider recognition of community-based organizations as the primary stewards of our core societal values. The ultimate intention of our work is to create a more just and democratic society.

Please see our meetup calendar for information on Third Sector's upcoming conference or visit their website at www.tsne.org.

1. Introductions and tell a bit about ourselves and topics that interest us for this and future meetings.

2. Denise Moorehead will introduce the work of Third Sector New England and talk about the upcoming 2007 Nonprofit Workout Conference "The Ways We Lead: Creating Adaptive, Inclusive Organizations"

3. We will make a list of relevent nonprofit topics and draw one or two topics from a hat to explore as a group.

4. Announcements, opportunities, connections.

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking.
item.name: Topic Drawing at Third Sector New England
